page.title: 05THE FARMS OF MISSON
page.content: There are three farms in Misson one farm is called Highwood which has 400 acres of land 100 acres of that is arable and 300 acres is grass. They hve got 18 fields altogether. They have got 2000 pigs and 480 cattle. Their 2 major products are pork and milk and they have 7 tractors altogether. Bull Hill Farm has 75 acres,15 arable and grass. They have got 9 fields and 65 cattle. Their major products are milk and calves.The 3rd farm is called Holly House Farm it has an area of 700 hundred acres most of which are arable.He has 50 fields and 120 cattle.The three major products are potatoes,milk and barley. He has 6 tractors and 1 combine Harvester.
